ref: 1346 *ārdhikakāra ʻ work of a co -- partner ʼ, or ardh˚. [ārdhika -- , kāra -- 1]
P. addhyārā m. ʻ the arrangement by which profits of agriculture or stockbreeding are shared between landlord and labourer ʼ;
A. ādhiyār ʻ one who cultivates in return for half the crop ʼ;
Or. adhiāri ʻ keeping a goat or calf with a half share of profit to the owner ʼ;
H. adhiyār m. ʻ cultivator who receives a half -- share ʼ, adhiyārī f. ʻ this system ʼ;
G. adhiyārũ n. ʻ keeping cattle in return for half the calves ʼ, adhiyārī f. ʻ forced labour ʼ.
